summary.description: > VERY_LOW CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'dopamine-related', 'resting-state', 'dopaminergic', 'fMRI' | Topological gene expression networks recapitulate brain anatomy and function | Code for reproducing results in the paper "Topological gene-expression networks recapitulate brain anatomy and function" | TDA summary for gene-expression: Mapper Algorithm in 2D | Understanding how gene expression translates to and affects human behaviour is one of the ultimate aims of neuroscience
summary.name: Mapper
